channel.title: Please Help! Connection Issues!
channel.description:
Ok. I have been coding my server for 2 weeks now. I am finally done, and I wish to play online. I signed up for a .webs account and made a website. I signed my jar and put my jar on the website to make a webclient. I am on a 562 running 602 server. I have changed all of the IPs needed and port forwarded my router.
Here is the problem: When I go on the web client on my desktop (which has the source) I can connect. When I go on any of my other 3 computers (which all have the cache and are all connected to the internet) to play the webclient, It downloads the cache but then it does not load. I have made sure all of the IPs are changed from 127.0.0.1 to (server IP). And the server is 24/7 so that isnt the problem. It's always on.
I am wondering if anyone knows the problem and how to fix it. Please Help me out, I do not have money to pay so someone please be nice enough to help for free.

item.title: Please Help! Connection Issues!
item.dc:creator: @Drew-Sker Drew-Sker
